entities.description: The individual who suffered harm or injury.
The individual who inflicted harm or injury upon the victim.
The type of relationship between the victim and the offender.
Detailed categorization of the specific relationship between victim and offender, such as spouse, parent, friend, etc.
The unweighted count of cases for each relationship type.
The percentage of total cases for each relationship type.
Information about missing data in the survey results.

relationships.description: Indicates that the victim suffered harm or injury inflicted by the offender.
Describes the type of relationship between the victim and the offender.
Provides detailed categorization of the specific relationship between victim and offender.
Specifies the unweighted count of cases for each specific relationship type.
Specifies the percentage of total cases for each specific relationship type.
Indicates the presence of missing data in the survey results.
